+ Menu Tabs

++ Toggle Ed./Prev. - [Ctrl-Shift-Space]
Switch between editor and [HTML preview] mode in current tab.

++ Enter Edit Mode - [Ctrl-Shift-A]
Shows editor in current tab.

++ Enter Preview Mode - [Ctrl-Shift-S]
Shows [HTML preview].

----
 
++ Show Folding
Shows/hides an additional margin to the left of the editor to control folding. See [Folding].

++ Toggle Current Folding
Fold/Unfold current line and following. See [Folding].

++ Unfold All
Unfold all lines.

++ Fold All
Fold all lines.
